title: Simple Shell Project
description: A Linux-based shell emulator that replicates several essential Windows cmd.exe commands—including dir, help, vol, path, tasklist, notepad (using nano), echo, color, ping, exit, and cls—providing a familiar command-line experience for users transitioning between Windows and Unix-like systems.

title: Algorithm Implementation Projects
description: Three interactive projects showcasing various searching and sorting algorithms with visual demonstrations and code implementations.

title: Threads Project
description: A multithreaded implementation of Merge Sort designed to efficiently sort integer arrays by leveraging parallel processing, improving performance through concurrent execution.
